channel.title: Qubes-Whonix R4.0 End of Security Support and Deprecation Notice - All users should move to Qubes R4.1!
channel.description:
As per Whonix [Support Schedule](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Support_Schedule), this post serves as Qubes-Whonix for Qubes R4.**0** deprecation notice.
Qubes-Whonix for Qubes R4.**1** stable has been released: https://forums.whonix.org/t/qubes-whonix-16-for-qubes-r4-1-is-available-debian-11-bullseye-based-major-release/13349
~~Qubes-Whonix for Qubes R4.**0** will be deprecated on `20 March 2022`.~~
**Qubes-Whonix for Qubes R4.**0** will be deprecated on `20 April 2022`.**
All Qubes R4.0 users should upgrade to Qubes R4.1.
Related:
* https://www.qubes-os.org/news/2022/02/04/qubes-4-1-0/ * https://www.qubes-os.org/doc/supported-releases/

item.title: Qubes-Whonix R4.0 End of Security Support and Deprecation Notice - All users should move to Qubes R4.1!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
As per Whonix Support Schedule, this post serves as Qubes-Whonix for Qubes R4.0 deprecation notice.

Qubes-Whonix for Qubes R4.1 stable has been released:
Qubes-Whonix 16 for Qubes R4.1 is available! (Debian 11 bullseye based) - Major Release

Qubes-Whonix for Qubes R4.0 will be deprecated on 20 March 2022.

Qubes-Whonix for Qubes R4.0 will be deprecated on 20 April 2022.

All Qubes R4.0 users should upgrade to Qubes R4.1.

Related:

  • Qubes OS 4.1.0 has been released! | Qubes OS
  • Supported releases | Qubes OS

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes-Whonix R4.0 End of Security Support and Deprecation Notice - All users should move to Qubes R4.1!
